parameter.value: Hello |PLAYERNAME|. Do not want to make an exchange? I have {Crystal Coins}, {Crystal Crossbow}, {Obsidian Truncheon}, {Stonecutter Axe}, {Magic Sword}, {Wand of Everblazing}, {Muck Rod}, {Cluster of Solace}, {Remover Skull}, {Refill Stamina}, {Frozen Starlight}, {sneaky stabber of eliteness}, {Squeezing Gear of Girlpower}, {Whacking Driller of Fate}, {Blood Herb}, {Zaoan chess box}, {medusa skull}, {dark wizards crown}, {pigeon trophy}, {little adventurer doll} and {midnight panther doll}.
